title: Chickpea and cauliflower curry
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons medium-hot curry paste', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '350ml vegetable stock', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '1/2 large cauliflower, chopped into florets', '200g frozen peas', 'basmati rice to serve', '1 tablespoon chopped coriander leaves to serve', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt to serve']
